name: Publicly Readable Google Cloud Buckets
query: { buckets( where: { cloudProvider: "gcp" publicAccessBlocked: false hasIAMPolicy_SOME: { bindings_SOME: { OR: [ { members_INCLUDES: "allUsers" } { members_INCLUDES: "allAuthenticatedUsers" } ] role: { OR: [ { includedPermissions_INCLUDES: "storage.objects.get" } { includedPermissions_INCLUDES: "storage.objects.list" } { includedPermissions_INCLUDES: "storage.objects.*" } ] } } } } ) {...AssetFragment} }
